mainSubtitle.id: Jelajahi, bandingkan, dan temukan layanan Alibaba Cloud yang tepat untuk kebutuhan Anda melalui panduan visual yang terkurasi.
mainSubtitle.en: Explore, compare, and find the right Alibaba Cloud services for your needs through curated visual guides.

computeDesc.id: Jelajahi layanan komputasi, dari Elastic Compute Service (ECS) hingga Function Compute yang serverless.
computeDesc.en: Explore compute services, from Elastic Compute Service (ECS) to serverless Function Compute.

storageDesc.id: Temukan solusi penyimpanan yang dapat diskalakan, termasuk Object Storage Service (OSS) dan Elastic Block Storage (EBS).
storageDesc.en: Find scalable storage solutions, including Object Storage Service (OSS) and Elastic Block Storage (EBS).

databaseDesc.id: Jelajahi database terkelola, dari ApsaraDB for RDS hingga PolarDB untuk skala besar.
databaseDesc.en: Explore managed databases, from ApsaraDB for RDS to PolarDB for large scale.

aimlDesc.id: Manfaatkan layanan AI, dari Image Search hingga Platform for AI (PAI).
aimlDesc.en: Leverage AI services, from Image Search to the Platform for AI (PAI).

analyticsDesc.id: Dapatkan wawasan dari data dengan MaxCompute, E-MapReduce, dan Quick BI.
analyticsDesc.en: Gain insights from data with MaxCompute, E-MapReduce, and Quick BI.

appintegrationDesc.id: Hubungkan aplikasi dan layanan dengan Message Service (MNS), API Gateway, dan EventBridge.
appintegrationDesc.en: Connect apps and services with Message Service (MNS), API Gateway, and EventBridge.

identityDesc.id: Kelola akses pengguna dan amankan identitas dengan Resource Access Management (RAM).
identityDesc.en: Manage user access and secure identities with Resource Access Management (RAM).

devtoolsDesc.id: Layanan untuk merencanakan, membangun, menguji, dan merilis perangkat lunak lebih cepat dengan Apsara DevOps.
devtoolsDesc.en: Services to plan, build, test, and release software faster with Apsara DevOps.

containersDesc.id: Jalankan aplikasi dalam kontainer dengan Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) dan Elastic Container Instance (ECI).
containersDesc.en: Run containerized applications with Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) and Elastic Container Instance (ECI).

hybridDesc.id: Perluas Alibaba Cloud ke lingkungan on-premise dengan Apsara Stack.
hybridDesc.en: Extend Alibaba Cloud to on-premises environments with Apsara Stack.

iotDesc.id: Hubungkan, pantau, dan kelola aset IoT dengan IoT Platform.
iotDesc.en: Connect, monitor, and manage IoT assets with IoT Platform.

managementDesc.id: Optimalkan dan kelola sumber daya cloud Anda dengan Cloud Monitor dan ActionTrail.
managementDesc.en: Optimize and manage your cloud resources with Cloud Monitor and ActionTrail.

migrationDesc.id: Pindahkan beban kerja, aplikasi, dan data ke cloud dengan Server Migration Center (SMC).
migrationDesc.en: Move workloads, applications, and data to the cloud with Server Migration Center (SMC).

networkingDesc.id: Bangun jaringan cloud dengan Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), Server Load Balancer (SLB), dan Alibaba Cloud DNS.
networkingDesc.en: Build a cloud network with Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), Server Load Balancer (SLB), and Alibaba Cloud DNS.

securityDesc.id: Lindungi dari ancaman dengan Security Center dan Web Application Firewall (WAF).
securityDesc.en: Protect against threats with Security Center and Web Application Firewall (WAF).
